revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - suggestions to l. 2 and l. 7 are fine (double-checked on the original)
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - suggestions to l. 2 and l. 7 are fine (double-checked on the original)

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - I’d like a second set of editorial eyes on the suggestions in l. 2 and l.7 (both look correct to me). TEXT: This is fine. Add a space after the apostrophe before the square bracket in l. 3. META: delete volume number from biblio 14433; add biblio 77804 as a ‘study’; update Berlin image link (https://berlpap.smb.museum/04326/); update display name with something like “Prose fragment with Homeric citation”; add Homer, Ilias to ‘work’ (as a citation) (TLG author 0012; TM Work 511); CWKB numbers for Homer (927) and Iliad (2815). Citations are of Il. 18.483 and 485; MP3 is 1202.01; dimensions are 6.4 cm (h) x 6 cm (w); Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575);
